author: trent_vanepps
content:
sharing the next ETHOnline Summit: Scaling and Infrastructure. There were some great presentations from Danny Ryan and Vitalik last Friday, we are expecting a similar caliber of quality this week. On **Friday Oct 9**, we dig deep into the latest technology helping developers build apps on Ethereum. We'll cover Layer 2 scaling, client improvements, decentralized storage, and more.

What is ETHOnline? A month of Summits all about Ethereum, plus a global online hackathon, organised by ETHGlobal: Learn More

Join live here: https://live.ethonline.org/

13:30 ET - Aztec 2.0 - A new layer 2 built with privacy at its core w/ Joe Andrews
14:00 ET - Phil & Georgios Talk Miner Extractable Value w/ Phil Daian & Georgios Konstantopoulos
14:30 ET - UX in Crypto: How to get your wallet mainstream w/ Thibaut Sahaghian

16:30 ET - Web3j Enterprise Panel w/ Dan Shaw
17:00 ET - Optimism: Keeping Ethereum Half-Full w/ Kelvin Fichter
17:30 ET - History of Node Infrastructure w/ Michael O'Rourke

author: fabdarice
content: I just came across a transaction that succeeds and only used 13,138 gas, anyone know how that is even possible? I thought the native transfer was the lowest there is (21K)?
